title: Food Delivery
description: A Full-Stack Food Delivery app where users can browse menus, place orders, make payments, and track deliveries, simulating a real-world food delivery system.

title: Gemini Clone
description: An AI-based platform designed to simulate intelligent responses and dynamic user interactions. It leverages advanced machine learning algorithms for generating context-aware replies and predictive analysis.

title: Chat Application
description: A real-time messaging platform that enables users to send and receive messages instantly. Features include user authentication, private and group chats, message timestamps, and online/offline status indicators

title: Ecommerce Site
description: An intuitive and responsive eCommerce platform featuring user authentication, product listings, search, and filter options. Supports a secure checkout process with payment methods like Cash on Delivery (COD) and Stripe.

title: Planet-X
